channel.title: Making Worldwide Game! Need employees
channel.description:
My friends and I are making a new game. So far we only have 3 people in, including me. This is what i'm looking for:
1. A person who knows an adequate amount of java 2. A person who knows how to host a server 3. A person who is good with python, visual basic, and/or C++ 4. A person who doesn't beg for a raise (yes, i mean as in money because we will make alot of it 5. A person who understands the rules based for the "project" 6. A person who is known for confidentiality
== Rules ==
1. Keep confidential until game release 2. No begging, spamming, or flaming 3. Taking any piece of equipment not authorized by a "LEVEL 4 MOD" is not permitted

     What? /6. A person who is known for confidentiality
